name: Dear Fear
description:
Dear Fear

You are lost in a mysterious forest, the only thing left is to walk your way out. But you can't help to feel stalked in these woods. Can you stop your fearing, in the forest clearing? A short, silly game about kindness and monsters who speak in rhymes, inspired by the 90's internet aesthetic as seen in "cameron's world".

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2022, the theme was "duality".

Diversifiers used:

- 20th Century Gaming.

- Everyone is a Creator.

- Rhyme or Reason.

- Emotional Rollercoaster (Sponsored by dotbigbang).

Platforms: 

- MS Windows, Mac OS X.

A game by Fishbowl Team:

Abril Araneda - Artist, Animator, First time game developer and resident non-gamer.

Catalina Céspedes - Artist, Writer.

Matías Gabler - Programer.

Francisco Pezoa - Artist, Writer.

GIF elements taken from www.cameronsworld.net/

Ambient sounds from mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/crickets/
